Run for colours without waiting.

A free online game on Round Games is Johnny Runner Colour Hyper Casual Game. It introduces us with colours and paperworks.

How to play

Butting into other businesses you can play this game. You have to wait in long lines and do paperworks. Your wait won't be long at all, so nothing to worry about. Without even noticing the wait can be completed in minutes.

Game controls

Desktop

Click the left click button of the mouse to run.

Mobile

Controls and indicators

  • Upper right side has  life spans.
  • Other rewards are shown in the upper portion of the screen.
